    • CYouTube

    modules/video/types/youTube.js

    import PlayerSettings from "../settings.js";

let playerSettings = new PlayerSettings();

export class YouTube {
    constructor(container, settings, stateData) {
        this._settings = settings;
        this._stateData = stateData;
        this.intervals = [];
        
        container.html(this.html);

        this.PlayerControlEvents = playerSettings.PlayerControlEvents;

    }

    createPlayer() {
        let {
           height = 'inherit', width = 'inherit', id, controls
        } = this._settings;
        let hasControls = 1;

        if (typeof controls === 'string') {
            hasControls = 0;
        }

        this.player = new YT.Player(`youtube-player`, {
           height: height,
            width: width,
            videoId: id,

            playerVars: {
                controls: hasControls,
                showinfo: 0,
                autohide: 1
            }
        });


    }

    dispose(iVXjsBus) {

        let {PlayerControlEvents} = this;
        let controlEventNames = Object.keys(PlayerControlEvents);
        let self = this;
        
       
        clearInterval(this.timeUpdateId);

        controlEventNames.forEach((controlEventName, index) => {
           
            if (!self[`${controlEventName}OnEvent`]) return;
            
            
            iVXjsBus.removeListener(PlayerControlEvents[controlEventName], self[`${controlEventName}OnEvent`]);
        });

    }

    addEventListeners(iVXjsBus) {
        let {_stateData: stateData, player, PlayerControlEvents} = this;
        let self = this;
        let timeUpdateId;
        let numberofTimeupdates = 0;

        PlayerControlEvents.playing = "iVX:video:playing";
        PlayerControlEvents.paused = "iVX:video:paused";
        PlayerControlEvents.ended = "iVX:video:ended";

        player.addEventListener('onStateChange',
            function onStateChange() {

                switch (player.getPlayerState()) {
                    case 0:
                        iVXjsBus.emit('iVX:video:ended', player, stateData);
                        break;
                    case 1:
                        iVXjsBus.emit('iVX:video:playing', player, stateData)
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        iVXjsBus.emit('iVX:video:paused', player, stateData);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        iVXjsBus.emit('iVX:video:buffering', player, stateData);
                        break;
                }

            });

        player.addEventListener('onReady',
            function onYouTubeOnReady() {

                self.playOnEvent = iVXjsBus.on(PlayerControlEvents.play, playOnEvent);
                self.pauseOnEvent = iVXjsBus.on(PlayerControlEvents.pause, pauseOnEvent);
                self.volumeOnEvent = iVXjsBus.on(PlayerControlEvents.volume, volumeOnEvent);
                self.durationOnEvent = iVXjsBus.on(PlayerControlEvents.duration, durationOnEvent);
                self.seekOnEvent = iVXjsBus.on(PlayerControlEvents.seek, seekOnEvent);
                self.pausedOnEvent = iVXjsBus.on(PlayerControlEvents.paused, pausedOnEvent);
                self.endedOnEvent = iVXjsBus.on(PlayerControlEvents.ended, endedOnEvent);
                self.playingOnEvent = iVXjsBus.on(PlayerControlEvents.playing, playingOnEvent);

                self.playOnEvent = typeof self.playOnEvent === 'function' ? self.playOnEvent : playOnEvent;
                self.pauseOnEvent = typeof self.pauseOnEvent === 'function' ? self.pauseOnEvent : pauseOnEvent;
                self.seekOnEvent = typeof self.seekOnEvent === 'function' ? self.seekOnEvent : seekOnEvent;
                self.durationOnEvent = typeof self.durationOnEvent === 'function' ? self.durationOnEvent : durationOnEvent;
                self.volumeOnEvent = typeof self.volumeOnEvent === 'function' ? self.volumeOnEvent : volumeOnEvent;
                self.pausedOnEvent = typeof self.pausedOnEvent === 'function' ? self.pausedOnEvent : pausedOnEvent;
                self.endedOnEvent = typeof self.endedOnEvent === 'function' ? self.endedOnEvent : endedOnEvent;
                self.playingOnEvent = typeof self.playingOnEvent === 'function' ? self.playingOnEvent : playingOnEvent;
                
                

                iVXjsBus.emit('iVX:video:canplay', player);
            })


        function playOnEvent() {
            clearInterval(self.timeUpdateId);
            player.playVideo();
        }

        function pauseOnEvent() {
            player.pauseVideo();
            clearInterval(self.timeUpdateId);
        }

        function durationOnEvent() {
            iVXjsBus.emit(PlayerControlEvents.getDuration, player.getDuration());
        }

        function volumeOnEvent(volume) {
            player.setVolume(volume * 100);
        }

        function playingOnEvent() {
            player.currentTime = player.getCurrentTime();

            iVXjsBus.emit('iVX:video:timeupdate', player);
            
            let currentNumber = numberofTimeupdates;
            self.timeUpdateId = setInterval(() => {
                player.currentTime = player.getCurrentTime();
                
                iVXjsBus.emit('iVX:video:timeupdate', player);
            }, 50);
            
            
            

        }

        function seekOnEvent(currentTime) {
            clearInterval(self.timeUpdateId);
            player.seekTo(currentTime);

        }

        function pausedOnEvent() {

            clearInterval(self.timeUpdateId);

        }

        function endedOnEvent() {
            clearInterval(self.timeUpdateId);
        }


    }


    get html() {



        return `
      
               <div id="youtube-player"></div>
        
        `

    }
};
    Generated by ESDoc(0.4.7)
